author: GameSpot
description:
Once Upon a Katamari is a delightful return for the series, offering the same core gameplay fans know and love while also adding even more fun and cleverness.

#katamaridamacy #katamari #gamespot
title: Once Upon A Katamari Review - I Love Mess!

author: GameSpot
description:
Check out the Ghouls 4 Games Showcase, where the creatively creepy takes center stage. The showcase is presented by Dames 4 Games. This special Halloween event spotlights women and femme-led developers crafting worlds full of imagination, mystery, and heart.

Ranging from eerie narrative adventures to cozy autumn tales, each title brings its own twist on what ghoulish means!
title: Ghouls 4 Games Showcase By Dames 4 Games

author: GameSpot
description: The Indie Horror Showcase, presented by DreadXP and The MIX, and co-hosted by John Wolfe and BigGaming64, premieres on October 23rd at 10:00 a.m. PDT / 1:00 p.m. EST. Tune in to see all the fun spooky games coming your way. Learn more about Brokenlore: DON’T LIE, Beneath, and KARMA: The Dark World.
title: The Indie Horror Showcase 2025 Livestream

author: GameSpot
description:
Tune into the Galaxies Autumn Showcase on October 23rd at 12pm PT, which will showcase over 50 games, including six world premieres.

Some game titles to be included in the showcase are: MOUSE: P.I. For Hire, Dumb Ways to Die, DEFECT , Solasta II and many more.

Some of the partners included in the showcase include: Devolver Digital, Nacon, Saber Interactive, Owlcat GamesKepler Interactive, Playstack, Secret Mode, Fireshine Games, Team17 and much more.
title: Galaxy Autumn Showcase 2025 Livestream

author: GameSpot
description:
Check out 10 minutes of Battlefield 6 Season 1 gameplay featuring two new maps Blackwell: Fields Badlands and Golden State Hidden Threat. We showcase both maps with Conquest on Blackwell: Fields Badlands and Escalation on Golden State Hidden Threat. Get a glimpse of some goofy golf cart gameplay in Battlefield 6 on Eastwood.

Timestamps: 
0:00 Intro
0:35 Repair-Tool Tank Takedown
01:29 Taking and Defending A
03:28 New Vehicle: APC Traverser Mark 2 Gameplay
06:17 Second Map: Eastwood - Golden State: Hidden Threat
07:50 Cruising Around the Neighborhood
08:17 Attempting to Capture Point A
09:23 Taking a Golf Cart Into Combat

#battlefield6 #bf6 #gaming #gameplay #BF6Season1 #gamespot
title: 10 Minutes Of Battlefield 6 Season 1 New Maps Gameplay (Blackwell Fields and Eastwood)

author: GameSpot
description:
PowerWash Sim was a breakout hit in 2021, and the sequel is a reminder of how that happened, though sometimes it feels like it's just punching in for work.

#powerwashsimulator #gamespot
title: Power Wash Simulator 2 Working Overtime - Review

author: GameSpot
description:
2025 has had its share of some incredible and terrifying horror games. From newcomers like Bloober Team's Cronos: The New Dawn, to major installments in legacy franchises like Silent Hill f, or indies making a big scare like Look Outside, the year has gifted us many scares. It's Halloween season, after all, and you're probably looking for the next thing to scare the wits out of you. So look no further than this list of the best horror games to play right now.

#cronosthenewdawngameplay #silenthillf #lookoutside #horrorgaming
title: Best Horror Games Of 2025 To Play Right Now
